code: import*as action from"actions";import*as api from"api";import*as repo from"js/fetch";export var setFittersDemand=function setFittersDemand(data){return{type:"SET_FITTERS_DEMAND",payload:data};};export var setFittersCertification=function setFittersCertification(data){return{type:"SET_FITTERS_CERTIFICATION",payload:data};};export var setFittersAssignmentTransfer=function setFittersAssignmentTransfer(data){return{type:"SET_FITTERS_ASSIGNMENT_TRANSFER",payload:data};};export var updateFittersAssignmentTransfer=function updateFittersAssignmentTransfer(data){return{type:"UPDATE_FITTERS_ASSIGNMENT_TRANSFER",payload:data};};export var confirmFittersAssignmentList=function confirmFittersAssignmentList(data){return function(dispatch){dispatch(action.showLoading());return api.postFittersAssignmentTransfer(data).then(function(response){repo.updateFittersAssignmentTransfer(response.data).then(function(){dispatch(action.updateFittersAssignmentTransfer(response.data));});}).catch(function(error){if(error.code===401){window.localStorage.removeItem("auth");dispatch(action.setAuth(null));}dispatch(action.setError(error.message));}).finally(function(){dispatch(action.hideLoading());});};};
